requirements_text.requirements:
**Functional Requirements**
==========================

* Develop AI-powered health monitoring systems for real-time data analysis and predictive analytics
* Design and deploy machine learning models for defect detection in PCB manufacturing
* Engineer IoT-based automation systems for real-time infrastructure monitoring and optimization
* Build AI-driven real-time deployment in manufacturing pipelines
* Develop Explainable AI (SHAP, Grad-CAM) for diagnostic transparency and transfer learning for enhanced generalization
* Optimize model performance with hyperparameter tuning and data augmentation
* Implement scalable real-time biometric data analysis and predictive analytics
* Develop API-driven health monitoring systems for real-time biometric data analysis

**Non-Functional Requirements**
=====================

* Ensure high accuracy in AI model predictions (e.g., 88% in ovarian cancer detection, 89% in PCB defect detection, and 90% in smart health monitoring)
* Optimize system performance for real-time data analysis and predictive analytics
* Ensure scalability and adaptability in manufacturing pipelines
* Implement secure and reliable data management and storage solutions
* Provide user-friendly interfaces for health tracking and predictive analysis
* Ensure system integration with various technologies (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, OpenCV, Django, Flask, MQTT)

**Constraints**
=============

* Limited availability of resources (e.g., computational power, data storage)
* Time constraints for project completion (e.g., October 2024 - December 2024 for Smart Health Monitoring)
* Limited access to certain technologies or tools (e.g., AWS, Oracle Cloud)

**Assumptions**
==========

* Availability of necessary data for AI model training and testing
* Access to necessary technologies and tools (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, OpenCV, Django, Flask, MQTT)
* Availability of necessary resources (e.g., computational power, data storage)
* Limited changes in project requirements during development
